channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Rev.
channel.desc: Adam's decision to allow a Muslim children's prayer group to use the church for classes brings forward his congregation's prejudices. Inspired by the clear moral stance he sees in the Islamic classes, Adam decides to take a stand himself and oppose a lapdancing club threatening to open opposite the school. When he finds himself in one of the branches checking out pole dancers in the name of research, things get more complicated.
